post:
Greetings from ZionVPS
Our website - https://zionvps.com

We provide OpenVZ and KVM servers, both DDoS protected ranging from 20 to 480Gbps. On request, we can modify reverse DNS of your IP and configure web application firewall for your IP.

OpenVZ servers are located in New York City, USA and has 01 RAID, Bandwidth upgraded to 1GbPS, and Intel Xeon E3 1245 processors.

KVM servers are located in Paris, France and has SSD cached disks with 01 RAID, Bandwidth upgraded to 1GbPS and Xeon E5-1620 processors.

KVM servers are located in Sofia,Bulgaria and comes with 1Gb/S uplink, RAID 10, with limited bandwidth(upgradable) and and Xeon E5-2450 processors.

Speedtest-


You can request for a custom VPS configuration in live chat or by inquiring here > https://zionvps.com/billing/contact.php
We use SolusVM as control panel and strictly forbid overselling of resources.
